level.heading: Human papillomavirus public education campaign.
level.text: By January 1, 2008, the Mayor shall initiate a public information campaign, including multiple HPV vaccine education forums in each ward, aimed at educating the public on:
The connection between HPV and cervical cancer;
The importance of protecting oneself against HPV infection;
The value of screening for cervical cancer through regular pap tests; and
The effectiveness and risks of the HPV vaccine.
